0110.name: Unknown
0110.message:
This service has been discontinued.
Thank you for using this service
0110.short_description: Game server is no longer available
0110.long_description: Game server has been discontinued and no longer able to be used.
0110.short_solution: You are likely not connected to Pretendo, or the game is available only for testers or not yet.
0110.long_solution: You are likely not connected to Pretendo Network, or the game is available only for testers or not yet. Make sure the game is supported and your console is loaded on Pretendo Network via Nimbus and try again.
